title: MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack, TSA Large Travel Backpack with Lunch Box, Anti-Theft Work Business Carry On with USB Port, Water Resistant Durable College Computer Backpack for Men Women
descriptions:
### MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack

#### Product Overview
Elevate your travel and daily commute with the MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack. Designed for professionals, teachers, and adventurers, this backpack offers a blend of functionality, style, and durability. Whether you're heading to a business meeting, a day at school, or a weekend getaway, the MATEIN backpack is the perfect companion.

#### Key Features

**Laptop Compatibility:**
- Fits laptops up to 17.3 inches, including 15.6, 15, 14, and 13.3 inch models.

**Insulated Cooler Compartment:**
- Dimensions: 11.4 inches (H) x 5.5 inches (W) x 6.9 inches (D)
- Capacity: Holds up to 10 cans
- Performance: Keeps food warm and drinks cold for 3-5 hours
- Features: Water-resistant aluminum, high-quality lining material, and foldable design

**Overall Dimensions:**
- 18.1 inches (H) x 12.9 inches (L) x 8.5 inches (W)

**Storage:**
- Main Zipper Pocket: Roomy for clothes, files, papers, and more
- Front Pockets: 2 small pockets for quick access to essentials
- Side Pockets: 2 pockets for an umbrella or facial tissues
- Internal Organizers: 1 slot and 1 key hook for organized storage

**Comfort:**
- External USB Port: Charge your devices on the go
- Charging Cable Included: Power bank required (not included)
- Breathable Mesh Pads: Padded shoulder straps, back, and handle for all-day comfort
- TSA-Friendly Unfolding: 90-180 degrees for easy security checks
- Luggage Strap: Securely attach to your suitcase

**Security:**
- Anti-Theft Pocket: Safely store passports, wallets, and ID cards
- Luggage Strap: Prevent theft and secure your backpack to your luggage

**Material:**
- High-Density Polyester Fabric: Durable and resistant to rips and scratches
- Water-Resistant: Protect your belongings from unexpected rain

**Suitability:**
- Ideal for teachers, business professionals, picnics, and travel

**Gift Idea:**
- Perfect for Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year

#### Why Choose MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack?
- **Versatility:** Suitable for a variety of uses, from daily commutes to weekend getaways.
- **Durability:** High-density polyester fabric ensures long-lasting performance.
- **Comfort:** Breathable mesh pads and padded straps make it comfortable for extended wear.
- **Security:** Anti-theft features and a TSA-friendly design provide peace of mind.
- **Convenience:** External USB port and multiple storage options keep you organized and connected.

#### Customer Testimonials
- "I love the MATEIN backpack! It's perfect for my daily commute and has enough space for my laptop and all my essentials."
- "The insulated cooler compartment is a game-changer. I can keep my lunch cold and my drinks cold all day long."
- "The anti-theft pocket is a great feature. I feel much more secure when traveling with my valuables."

#### Conclusion
The MATEIN 17 Inch Laptop Backpack is more than just a bag; it's a versatile and reliable companion for your daily adventures. Order yours today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and security.

---

**Note:** This product is flight approved and makes an excellent gift for various occasions.
